TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed QueueTransferProtocol extends System.Enum

summary.span: Indique le protocole à utiliser le transfert de messages entre les gestionnaires de file d'attente.

span.span: Indicates the protocol to be used in transferring messages between queue managers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En spécifiant le protocole Srmp ou SrmpSecure lorsque l’attribut UseActiveDirectory est définie sur `true` provoquera une exception car Message Queuing (MSMQ) ne fournit pas d’adressage Active Directory lors de l’utilisation de SRMP.Specifying Srmp or SrmpSecure when the UseActiveDirectory attribute is set to `true` will cause an exception because Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not provide for Active Directory addressing when using SRMP. UseActiveDirectory est un attribut sur le [ <netMsmqBinding> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) et [ <msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md).UseActiveDirectory is an attribute on the [<netMsmqBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/netmsmqbinding.md) and the [<msmqIntegrationBinding>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/msmqintegrationbinding.md). Pour plus d’informations sur l’adressage de files d’attente, consultez [points de terminaison de Service et l’adressage de file d’attente](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).For more information about addressing queues, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Native = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Srmp = int32(1)

summary.span: Utilisez le protocole SRMP (SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol).

span.span: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol SrmpSecure = int32(2)

summary.span: Utilisez le transport Sécurisé SRMPS (SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure).

span.span: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure (SRMPS) transport.
